column4: If I can't get X to work in Edgy, would there be a way to drop back to Dapper?
Hrmm. I may have to find tools to do the project in Windows, then, since I seem to be hosed Linux-wise.
Well, I'm working on a music project that I'd been intending to do in Rosegarden -- but when I updated my Presario M2000 from Dapper to Edgy, X died
Any chance that you have a copy of the X config file from your dapper install?
